title: The Intern
description: * Book #1 (Lust) in Jess C Scott’s Sins07 “seven deadly sins” series—a teenage version of Dirty Dancing meets Punk’d.17-year-old Suzie Q, smart kid and closet dance enthusiast, travels with a classmate to a world-class city for an internship program. She finds herself undeniably attracted to the suave hip-hop instructor, Jo.Zee, who recruits her into a dance fitness DVD he is producing. When Suzie sees (or thinks she sees) the real Jo.Zee, she must decide if she will trust him...or her instincts.Genre: Contemporary Fiction / YA with adult crossover appeal* SINS07 is a series featuring lighthearted tales that explore each of the seven sins in order, beginning with lust.
author: Jess C. Scott
